import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {select, Store} from '@ngrx/store'; import { IAppState } from 'store/state/app.state'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { selectCartList} from 'store/selectors/cart.selector'; import { Cart } from 'src/app/model/cart'; import { GetCartItemAction } from 'store/actions/cart.action'; import { CartWithProducts } from 'src/app/model/CartWithProducts'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { item$? : CartWithProducts[] subtotal?: number; constructor(private store : Store) { this.store.dispatch(GetCartItemAction()); this.store.select(selectCartList).subscribe(res =>{ this.item$ = res; }); } ngOnInit(): void { } }
